titles.title: I Will Lift Up My Eyes To The Hills

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will lift up my eyes to the hills
From whence cometh my help.
My help cometh from the Lord,
The Lord which made heaven and earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He said He would not suffer thy foot,
Thy foot to be moved.
The Lord which keepeth thee
He will not slumber nor sleep.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For the Lord is thy Keeper,
The Lord is thy shade upon thy right hand,
Upon thy right hand.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
For the sun shall not smite thee by day,
Nor the moon by night.
He shall preserve thy soul, even forevermore.
My help, my help, my help,
All of my help, cometh from the Lord.
